title: Talyah's E should work like Lux's E
body: I feel like Talyah's dmg is way too concentrated on her Q. Nerfing her Q dmg, increasing her E dmg and turning her E  into a "poppable" skill like lux's E would make her a less akward Champion. Moreover, it would increase her control mage potential. Her  actual Unraveled Earth doesn't really seems like a threat, and it's really commun to see someone just walking through it.

replies.body:
Uhh yeah no, just learn how to play the champion.
right now's probably not a great time to pick her up though given the recent death by nerf bat.
Then you would either have to get rid of the high dash through damage one would receive or change her W to make it actually useful.
